name: Ultimately Futile Robot Power Struggle
description:
In war-ravaged future battle grounds an arbitrarily-bordered, nondescript arena, robots fight for the last remaining fusion reactors in order to power themselves and continue fighting for the last remaining fusion reactors.

This is our first LDJam game, and it turns out we over-scoped. We had originally planned to have several crowd control mechanics and a better arena, but as so many things in life often do, it just devolved into robots blowing each other up.

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Aim/Turn
  • Shift - Block
  • Shift & WASD - Dodge Roll
  • Left Click - Fire
  • Right Click - Special/Stronger Fire
  • E - Throw weapon
  • R - Respawn
Gameplay

It’s you against an army of power hungry robots. With limited power reserves available, you must punch reactors to take them and maintain control over them to siphon off all the power for yourself! Use stronger attacks to deal more damage at the expense of more of your energy, but be careful. Expend it all and you die. You WILL need to block and dodge against weapon-wielding bots, so learn to love that Shift button!
